structure.unit: B FERTILIZER AND PESTICIDE USE AND APPLICATION

text.section: No person shall engage in the business of applying pesticides to the lands of another within this state at any time without a pesticide operator's license issued by the department. The department shall require an annual fee of twenty-five dollars ($25) for each pesticide operator's license issued.
No license shall be issued unless the applicant holds a valid certification within this category.
No license shall be issued unless the applicant is registered as a dealer or is employed by a person who is registered as a dealer.

law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 4, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 69, effective July 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 148, secs. 1 and 6. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 7.
